member.summary: This represents the base app settings entity.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Extensions.OperationSystem
member.summary: This represents the entity to determine operating system.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Extensions.OperationSystem.IsWindows
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the OS is Windows or not.
member.returns: True, if the OS is Windows; otherwise returns False.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Extensions.OperationSystem.IsMacOs
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the OS is Mac or not.
member.returns: True, if the OS is Mac; otherwise returns False.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Extensions.OperationSystem.IsLinux
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the OS is Linux or not.
member.returns: True, if the OS is Linux; otherwise returns False.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Extensions.ConfigurationBinderExtensions
member.summary: This represents the extension entity for class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Extensions.ConfigurationBinderExtensions.Get``1(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the instance from the configuration.
member.returns: Returns the instance from the configuration.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Resolvers.ConfigurationResolver
member.summary: This represents the resolver entity for configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Resolvers.ConfigurationResolver.Resolve

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Resolvers.ConfigurationResolver.GetValue``1(System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.param: instance from the environment variables - either local.settings.json or App Settings blade.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.OpenApi.Configuration.AppSettings.Resolvers.ConfigurationResolver.GetBasePath(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Gets the base path of the executing Azure Functions assembly.
